bibl.title: Despatch
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p: I have to praise the citizen referred to, João José Rodrigues Leitãs, for the important part which he took in this notable event.

Requiring to establish henceforward in the territories of Cacongo and Massabe recently placed under the protection of the Portuguese Government, an authority to Superintend and regulate the relations of nations and foreigners, guaranteeing to the one the rights of Portuguese citizens which to day they are, and to the others the free exercise of their liberties, I have nominated as delegate of the Portuguese Government in the territories referred to the citizen João José Rodrigues Leitãs.
